definitions.definition: To exhibit a conspicuous (sometimes malevolent ) pleasure or sense of self-satisfaction , often at an adversary's misfortune .
examples: You did well to win the game, but there's no need to gloat about it.

definitions.definition: To triumph , crow , relish , glory , revel .

main_definition: To exhibit a conspicuous (sometimes malevolent ) pleasure or sense of self-satisfaction , often at an adversary's misfortune .
secondary_definitions: To triumph , crow , relish , glory , revel .
